/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -Wno-deprecated-declarations   CMakeFiles/CS370C_RESEARCH_PROJECt_bin,.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CS370C_RESEARCH_PROJECt_bin,.dir/meanCurvatureFlow.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CS370C_RESEARCH_PROJECt_bin,.dir/helpers.cpp.o  -o CS370C_RESEARCH_PROJECt_bin,  -L/usr/local/lib  -L/opt/local/lib  -L/lusr/lib  -L/lusr/opt/glfw-3.1.2/lib -rdynamic -lGL libigl/glew/libglew.a libigl/glfw/src/libglfw3.a -lrt -lm -ldl -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/opt/local/lib:/lusr/lib:/lusr/opt/glfw-3.1.2/lib
